effect.sun_moon: Heals the user for ½ its max HP. During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Heals the user for ½ its max HP. During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Heals the user for ½ its max HP. During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.

short_effect.sun_moon: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.
